The video was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been viewed more than 208,000 times and shared more than 4,300 times since.
The Indonesian: language caption of the post translates to English as: “In Kuala Lumpur those who go outside of their house were shot by fireworks launched by a drone."
The original video was posted on Instagr: 2019, and it shows a prank staged in Brazil.
